verses.text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:+ 129.1 Many…: or, Much*
Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.+ 129.2 Many…: or, Much*
The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
Let them be as the grass upon* the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** be* upon you: we bless you in the name of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**.
